appDesc: A browser wallet for the Miden blockchain
clickIconToResetPermissions: Click on the X icon to reset permissions.
resetPermissionsConfirmation:
Are you sure you want to reset permissions for
 {{origin}}?
name: Name
doNotSharePrivateKey2: It can be used to steal your current account.
doNotShareViewKey1: Only share with people you trust!
doNotShareViewKey2: It can be used to view all of your transaction history.
atLeast8Characters: At least 8 characters - the more characters, the better.
mixtureOfUppercaseAndLowercaseLetters: A mixture of both uppercase and lowercase letters.
mixtureOfLettersAndNumbers: A mixture of letters and numbers.
atLeast1SpecialCharacter: Inclusion of at least one special character, e.g., ! @ # ? ] - (optional, recommended).
mnemonicSpacingConstraint: Each word separated with a single space
seedPasteFailedTooManyWords: Paste failed because it contained over 24 words.
seedPhraseTip: You can paste your entire secret Seed phrase into any field
mayHappenBecauseYouAreOffline: This may happen because you are currently offline
resetExtensionConfirmation:
Are you sure you want to reset the Miden Wallet?
As a result, all your data will be deleted.
youCannotGetPrivateKeyFromThisAccountTyp: You cannot get private key from {{accountType}} accounts.
accountNameInputDescription: What will be the name of the new account?
transactionBackground: Transaction will proceed in the background.
transactionDelegated: Transaction has been sent for proof generation.
openedNewTab: The wallet opened a new tab to speed up the transaction. That tab will auto-close.
fastTransactionDescription: The transaction will automatically be broadcasted and finalized.
keepTabOpenForSync: Keep this tab open for faster sync.
openNewTabToSync: Open a tab for faster syncing.
viewKeyInputDescription: The View key of the Account you want to import.
privateKeyInputDescription: The Secret key of the Account you want to import.
revealViewKeyDescription: Also known as "Share Account History", reveals view key for your selected account.
revealPrivateKeyDescription: Also known as "Export Account", reveals private key for your selected account.
revealSeedPhraseDescription: Also known as "Export Wallet", you may need this seed phrase to access your wallet and accounts on other devices.
dAppsDescription: In this section you can enable ability to interact with decentralized applications that support Miden Wallet.
removeAccountDescription: Use this section to remove your selected account. Only imported accounts can be removed.
advancedSettingsDescription: Tools to help you debug and diagnose issues with Miden Wallet.
aboutDescription: Use this section to view meta info about Miden Wallet.
unlockPasswordErrorDelay: You have entered the wrong password three times. Your wallet is being blocked for
dAppsCheckmarkPrompt: Click on the toggle to {{action}} DApps interaction feature
minimalFeeGreaterThanBalanceVerbose: Minimal fee for this transaction is greater than your balance. A large fee may be required because of you sending funds to an empty Manager account. That requires a one-time 0.06425 {{gasTokenSymbol}} burn fee;
confirmRisk: I understand the risk and wish to proceed.
doNotSharePhrase1: DO NOT share this phrase with anyone!
doNotSharePhrase2: It can be used to steal all your accounts.
youWillNeedThisSeedPhrase: Please write down your secret recovery phrase and keep it in a safe place. This phrase is the only way to recover your account. Do not share it with anyone. Anyone with this phrase can take your assets forever.
ifYouWantToRemoveAnotherAccount: If you want to remove another account - select it in the top-right dropdown.
enterPasswordToRemoveAccount: Enter password to remove the Account.
ifYouWantToRevealViewKeyFromOtherAccount: If you want to reveal a view key from another account - you should select it in the top-right dropdown.
viewKeyFieldDescription: Current account view key. Keep it in secret. Anyone with this key can see your transaction history
ifYouWantToRevealPrivateKeyFromOtherAcco: If you want to reveal a view key from another account - you should select it in the top-right dropdown.
privateKeyFieldDescription: Current account key. Keep it in secret.
pathForHDAccounts: for HD acccounts. This is the thing you use to recover all your accounts from your seed phrase.
mainAssetBalanceIsZero: Your Miden credits (main asset) balance is zero. Miden credits are required for the fee.
unableToSendTransactionAction: Unable to send transaction to provided Recipient.
unableToEstimateTransactionAction: Unable to estimate transaction to provided Recipient.
languageAndCountry: By default, we use the language of your browser. Change it below if that's not to your liking.
generalSettingsDescription: Here you can manage languages preferences and display mode.
proofGenerationTab: An open tab is required to efficiently generate transaction proofs
ifYouDontSeeYourAsset:
If you don't see your asset,
try to click {{toClick}}.
popupSettingsDescription: Here you can configure the popup which appears on plugin's icon click in extensions panel.
delegateProofSettingsDescription: Here you can configure delegation of proof generation to a remote server. This will speed up proof generation but disclose the transaction details to a trusted server.
autoCloseSettingsDescription: Here you can configure auto close of the generating transaction page after the transaction is generated.
analyticsSettingsDescription: Here you can configure sending of anonymous analytics that helps us to improve the product.
addressBookDescription: Add, remove and manage your contacts.
contactWithTheSameAddressAlreadyExists: Contact with the same address already exists
deleteContactConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this contact?
lockUpSettingsDescription: The extension will be automatically blocked after 10 minutes of inactivity.
verifyMessagePrefix: Confirm you've saved your secret recovery phrase. Select the first and last words from your phrase.
onlyMidenSeedPhrasesAreSupported: Only Miden Seed phrases are supported.
createPasswordDescription: Set a password to unlock your wallet each time you use your computer. It can't be used to recover your wallet.
minimumCharsWithAtLeast: Minimum 8 characters with at least 1 number
backUpWalletInstructions: Save these 12 words to a password manager, or write down and store in a secure place. Do not share with anyone.
resetRequiredDescription: Miden Testnet has upgraded to bech32 account IDs to improve your experience. To keep using your wallet, please restore from a backup file or seed phrase, or create a new one.
forgotPasswordDescription: If you've forgotten your password, you need to sign out and re-import your account. After that, you can create a new password.
forgotPasswordSecondDescription: Do not sign out unless you know your 12-word Seed phrase or have an encrypted backup file.
chooseImportTypeDescription: Restore public balance with your 12-word phrase. To restore private balance, upload an encrypted backup file.
importWithSeedPhraseDescription: Use an existing 12 word recovery phrase. You can also import wallets from other wallet providers.
importWithEncryptedWalletFileDescription: Upload your encrypted wallet file to securely import your account. Your data remains private, with only hashed information stored on-chain
encryptedWalletFileDescription: Enter your password to access your Encrypted Wallet File. Turn off screen sharing. Don't share it with anyone.
encryptedWalletFileConfirmation: I will not share my Encrypted Wallet File with anyone, including Miden Wallet.
enterPasswordToEncrypt: Enter a password to encrypt your wallet file. You'll need this password to restore your wallet later.
noOtherAccountsDescription: You have not created any other accounts yet
amountMustBeLessThanBalance: Amount must be less than balance
explorePrivateAssets: Explore the world of private assets.
autoConsumeSettingsDescription: Auto Consume will automatically consume notes from the official Miden Faucet.
encryptedWalletFileExportedDescription: Your encrypted wallet file has been downloaded. Keep it and your password safe, as losing them means losing access to your wallet.
doNotShareEncryptedWalletFile: Do not share your Encrypted Wallet File!
confirmPrivateDataPermissionDescription: This will give permanent access to your account data and cannot be revoked.
privateAccountAccessRequest: This site is requesting access to your private account.
publicAccountAccessRequest: This site is requesting access to your public account.
balanceAccess: Let it see your wallet balance and activity
sendTransactionRequests: Let it send you requests for transactions
fundsStayInWallet: Funds will not leave your wallet until you execute a transaction
accessWillBeGranted: Access to the following data will be granted
confirmationRequired: Confirmation is required every time account data is requested
doNotShareEncryptedWalletFileDescription: With the file and password, anyone can access your wallet.
transactionWillProceedInBackground: Transaction will proceed in the background
privateFeeDescription: Transaction fee is processed publicly on the blockchain.
noPrivateTokensForFee: You have no Private tokens. Convert Public tokens to Private to use them as Fee.
noPublicTokensForFee: You have no Public tokens. Convert Private tokens to Public to use them as Fee.
delegateTransactionTooltip: Configure delegation of proof generation to a remote server. This will speed up proof generation but disclose the transaction details to a trusted server.
doNotCloseWindowNavigateHome: Do not close this window. You will be navigated back to the home page after the transaction is generated
doNotCloseWindowAutoClose: Do not close this window. Window will auto-close after the transaction is generated
transactionSuccessDescription: Your transaction was successfully processed and confirmed on the network.
transactionErrorDescription: There was an error processing your transaction. Please try again.
onChainAccountDescription: Use an existing 12 word recovery phrase. You can also import wallets from other wallet providers.
offChainAccountDescription: Fast, private operations with minimal fees, bypassing direct blockchain interaction.
chooseAccountTypeDescription: Select how you want to interact with the blockchain -- on-chain or off-chain.
canAddMultipleAccountsLater: You can add and manage multiple account types later within the wallet.
transactionVerifiedSuccessfully: The transaction has been successfully verified. You can now claim your tokens.
transactionFileCouldNotBeVerified: The uploaded transaction file could not be verified. Ensure the file is valid and try again.
sharePrivateNoteDataForAccount: Share all private note data for account
transactionAffectsAccountStorage: This transaction affects your account storage. Review the raw summary to verify
getTokensDescription: You can get tokens from the faucet or transfer them from another wallet or account.
midenFaucetDescription: Clicking the button below will copy your address to the clipboard and navigate you to the Miden Faucet.
setNewFaucetIdDescription: Enter the ID of a miden faucet
transactionProcessingDescription: The uploaded transaction file is being processed to verify its details. Please do not refresh or close the app.
walletMayBeOffline: Wallet may be offline or out of sync.
noteConsumptionError: There was an error consuming your note. Please try again.
recallBlocksDescription: If the recipient does not accept the transaction within this time, the funds will be returned to you.
byProceeding: By proceeding, you agree to the
enterDecryptionPassword: Enter the password you set when exporting your wallet. This will decrypt the file and restore access.
dappBrowserDescription: Browse decentralized apps and connect your wallet securely
dappConnectionRequest: This app wants to connect to your wallet
dappTransactionRequest: This app is requesting a transaction
biometricUnlockDescription: Use Face ID or fingerprint to unlock your wallet instead of entering your password.
biometricSetupDescription: Use your face or fingerprint to quickly unlock your wallet.
biometricSetupSubtitle: Enable biometric authentication for faster, more secure access to your wallet.
biometricNotAvailable: Biometric authentication is not available on this device
enterPasswordToEnableBiometric: Enter your password to enable biometric unlock
